story:
You may be wondering why we call ourselves Clipper Condom… the answer is quite simple! The word condom is synonymous with protection, which is exactly what we provide by protecting clipper and trimmer blades from accidental damage, breakage, and misalignment.

Clipper Condom comes with a 0.5mm form-fitted neoprene sleeve for ultimate protection so your clippers can withstand accidental drops and blundered handling.

Misaligned blades can be a serious issue, leading to a lack of precision, leading to unhappy customers who are unlikely to repeat business with you. This can cause massive loss of clientele over time, especially since word of mouth is huge in the hair care world. With Clipper Condom, you can travel freely without fear of misaligning your blades.

In the past, the only option to keep your blades sharp and protected was using a clunky multi-unit storage case much larger than you’d ever need — not great for portability or style. Clipper Condom solves this problem with its contoured individual cases that cradle your clippers perfectly without the extra bulk.

Instead of being forced to buy a giant case to protect your clippers and trimmers, Clipper Condoms are each sold individually in two different sizes - one for clippers and one for trimmers — for a reasonable price. This way, you can customize your blade protection solution without purchasing unnecessary, oversize products or wasting money.

Ever spend too much time trying to find the right clippers in your arsenal? Clipper Condom comes in a rainbow of color options, so it’s super easy for you to visually organize your collection and grab the right tool the first time, every time.

Not interested in color coding your clipper collection? You can still enjoy Clipper Condom’s wide variety of colors, choosing the colors that best fit your personal or professional aesthetic.

With the busy schedules of pet owners’, it’s no surprise that mobile pet grooming is a booming business. With Clipper Condom, your blades are always sharp and protected no matter where duty calls, so that your canine customers can have a beautiful cut every time.

Non-professional hair care enthusiasts know the value of sharp, precise blades — but maintaining their tools can be a real hassle. Clipper Condom’s compact cases keep blades from becoming damaged without heavily investing in equipment or time.

Clipper Condom is individualized and customizable, which means that you can easily select the perfect gift for any barber or hair care enthusiast in your life. Plus, our colorful designs come with a quirky, irreverent slogan that’ll be sure to put a smile on their face.

Each Clipper Condom will retail for $7.95–12.95, depending on the piece’s size, material, and style. Considering that the cost of replacement blades can soar as high as $25, each Clipper Condom will easily pay for itself in time! Get in on the Early Bird offer to get an even better deal.

Clipper Condom offers three different high-quality external material options, all with a Form-fitted neoprene interior and drawstring and zipper fasteners. The base model exterior is made of lightweight, waterproof nylon. The next level up is made of luxe nylon-plush velvet, which is a thicker material with an old-school charm and texture. Our banner product is quilted nylon, which provides the highest level of protection and padding while still maintaining a streamlined, water-resistant aesthetic.

Whenever I traveled with my clippers, I’d always end up with broken or misaligned blades. In one 6-month period, I spent north of $100 just to replace the blades and another $100 to pay a barber to align the new blades. 

I looked everywhere for a solution to this problem, to no avail. When I realized just how many people had encountered the same problem, I decided to create a solution myself. I’ve introduced Clipper Condom to some of the most prominent barbers and pet groomers in their respective industries and I’m more confident than ever that anyone who owns clippers and trimmers will agree — Clipper Condom is the best way to protect your tools.

 

Risks and challenges

Bringing Clipper Condom from concept to production has been an incredibly amazing experience thus far. I have learned a great deal about product development, marketing and promotion; all critical skills for entrepreneurs in any industry. Throughout this process, I was careful to take heed of the insights from our product focus groups and directly manage the quality control process. Clipper Condom has been "shop-tested and approved" by the professionals who have influenced its development most. The enthusiasm and support of barbers, stylists and groomers have reinforced my belief that Clipper Condom has a rightful place in the storage bins and compartments of personal groomers everywhere. I am highly encouraged  to bring the Clipper Condom to the Indiegogo Community. With your support and feedback, the rigors of branding, packaging, testing, manufacturing, marketing, focus groups will be all worthwhile. Your support will help to position Clipper Condom for mass production in far greater quantities and international distribution.

The only foreseeable risks are delays in Customs but even those can be mitigated with contract shipping of higher quantities. Please know, we'll take every proactive measure with our suppliers to ensure timely delivery of holiday orders.

I'm committed to delivering you the highest quality product, on time. Each backer can expect complete transparency every step of the way.

Finally, a generous, 'Thank you,' from the Clipper Condom team for your enthusiasm and continued support. Together, we are bringing this clever, niche product to a vibrant consumer community.
story_txt: You may be wondering why we call ourselves Clipper Condom… the answer is quite simple! The word condom is synonymous with protection, which is exactly what we provide by protecting clipper and trimmer blades from accidental damage, breakage, and misalignment.Clipper Condom comes with a 0.5mm form-fitted neoprene sleeve for ultimate protection so your clippers can withstand accidental drops and blundered handling.Misaligned blades can be a serious issue, leading to a lack of precision, leading to unhappy customers who are unlikely to repeat business with you. This can cause massive loss of clientele over time, especially since word of mouth is huge in the hair care world. With Clipper Condom, you can travel freely without fear of misaligning your blades.In the past, the only option to keep your blades sharp and protected was using a clunky multi-unit storage case much larger than you’d ever need — not great for portability or style. Clipper Condom solves this problem with its contoured individual cases that cradle your clippers perfectly without the extra bulk.Instead of being forced to buy a giant case to protect your clippers and trimmers, Clipper Condoms are each sold individually in two different sizes - one for clippers and one for trimmers — for a reasonable price. This way, you can customize your blade protection solution without purchasing unnecessary, oversize products or wasting money.Ever spend too much time trying to find the right clippers in your arsenal? Clipper Condom comes in a rainbow of color options, so it’s super easy for you to visually organize your collection and grab the right tool the first time, every time.Not interested in color coding your clipper collection? You can still enjoy Clipper Condom’s wide variety of colors, choosing the colors that best fit your personal or professional aesthetic.With the busy schedules of pet owners’, it’s no surprise that mobile pet grooming is a booming business. With Clipper Condom, your blades are always sharp and protected no matter where duty calls, so that your canine customers can have a beautiful cut every time.Non-professional hair care enthusiasts know the value of sharp, precise blades — but maintaining their tools can be a real hassle. Clipper Condom’s compact cases keep blades from becoming damaged without heavily investing in equipment or time.Clipper Condom is individualized and customizable, which means that you can easily select the perfect gift for any barber or hair care enthusiast in your life. story:
Intro

My name is Josh and I am the founder of Impact Fuel and the Sponsored Rider Club. My passion for powersports and helping others has manifested into these two projects:

  1. Impact Fuel - My goal here is to transform the riding experience into sponsor-funded charitable donations (i.e. make every ride impactful). Check out impactfuel.org.
  2. Sponsored Rider Club - The vision is to create a community for riders and racers to learn how to best market themselves in order to build strong, lasting, and successful relationships with sponsors. The target market for this club is ATV, UTV, motocross, and snocross racers along with backcountry snomobilers.

This particular campaign is all about bringing the Sponsored Rider Club to a whole new level of impact. Ultimately, I want to:

  • Bring to life the challenges successful riders have overcome.
  • Highlight and promote best practices.
  • Outline specifics to define and hone in personal marketing strategies.
  • Motivate and inspire riders/racers to build the confidence to DOMINATE their dreams.

What We Need & What You Get

Alright, so let's get down to the brass tax of what I need to make this dream a reality:

  • Microsoft Surface Book - $2012.94

​(my ol' 2006 Dell just ain't gonna cut the mustard...it is literally held together with superglue and electrical tape...and it is getting very warm while creating this campaign). This computer will also allow me to utilize my natural artistic abilities to create killer graphics for the podcast.

  • Blue Snowball Microphone with shock mount, headphones, and pop filter. - $143.94

  • Pamela for Skype - Professional Edition recording software - $27.82

  • One year subscription to Lybsyn (podcast hosting service) - $180

  • One year subscription to Skype (platform for making calls to interviewees) - $83.88

  • I have some killer perks as well, including a 25% off promo code for the Sponsored Rider Club Podcast t-shirt, super sweet Impact Multiplier t-shirts/hoodies (many options available at impactfuel.org), and a chance to be featured as a recurring sponsor on the podcast.

​

If I don't reach my entire funding goal, I will be selling one of my less critical organs (or taking out a small business loan) to cover the remaining costs. I WILL BE DOING THIS PODCAST THOUGH (just maybe with one less kidney).

The Impact

Look. Riders and racers are successful because they are smart, dedicated, and athletically superior to normal human beings (like myself). However, they still need help. It is very scary and confusing for riders to put themselves out there and ask for support from others (trust me, I can relate).

I truly believe I can remove some of the fear and anxiety for racers seeking sponsorship opportunities by creating an open forum to discuss the best practices, and dive into and debunk the fears.

I have interviewed hundreds of people in my career, and I excel at coaching. Help me bring my skill set into the powersports industry so that these riders can become the best version of themselves.

Risks & Challenges

Let's be honest, starting a podcast has some risk involved. First off, it could suck. Second off, it could be great, and maybe nobody listens to it because I don't market it properly.

What if someone does listen to it though. What if just one person hears a success story, and that person learns a tip or changes their mindset, which ultimately leads to them taking the next big step in becoming the successful rider they have always dreamed of becoming. Yep...those are called chills, you know, the ones that are running down the back of your neck right now.

With the following I have built so far on Impact Fuel's social media (via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, and Snapchat) and the Sponsored Rider Club, along with the amazing people I have networked with in the powersports industry, I feel confident that I can overcome these challenges and make a true impact on people's lives

Other Ways You Can Help

I am ecstatic if you have read this far! It means you see the vision. However, you might not have your mattress stuffed with extra cash. No worries. You can still help.

  • Share this campaign with your friends, family, and closest pets.
  • Like/follow/share all things Impact Fuel on our social media (@impactfuel).
  • If you are a rider/racer looking to join the club, search "Sponsored Rider Club" on facebook and request to join.

story:
Dear S.U.N. Family & Friends.

It is with great regret that due to the higher production costs at this years event and the surprising lack of ticket sales we have lost a considerable amount of money.

However, we really truly believe in what we do and we are fully committed to creating the homeland of the psychedelic underground tribe here.

Currently, we are the ONLY non-profit organization of such in Hungary, and we are are facing the possibility of closing down. Please help us to continue S.U.N.

History

2011 - 2012

The idea of the event was born in 2011 when the original organizer team left Ozora to create a new community based festival. An international collective was formed and introduced at Boom Festival 2012, and the first event took place in December the 21st celebrating the Triple Rebirth of the Sun.

Video: S.U.N. introduction @ BOOM Festival in 2012.
 

2013

The tribe has grown considerably and in 2013 the first S.U.N. Festival took place - an unforgettable self-transforming experience.  

Video: Heliopolis - A movie about the effect of transformational festivals.
 

2014

Thousands of people gathered in peace and came back the next year when presumably Ozora festival attacked the S.U.N. with a trademark trick and shot down the important online channels (webpage, Facebook page with over 110 thousand fans, Flickr album etc). Cutting the communication created enough confusion to keep the people away, and the organizer company collapsed. It took 2 years for the European court to declare the ‘bad-faith’ of the attack.

Video: Interconnected - The S.U.N. Festival 2014 after-movie
 

2015

To save the original project a few people stayed and together with the lovers of this magical land went on with the ‘Solar United Natives’ project, which is more than a festival: a healing ‘new-conscious’ community gathering. Fruit trees were planted, a community garden and kitchen were made, and a limited number private event was held with only 1,000 visitors. The seed was planted and it survived to grow.

From this time ONLY two non-profit organisations and the community itself have been leading the project.

​

Video: S.U.N. 2015 - Made from the video footage provided by the S.U.N. community.

2016

Then the members voted for a bigger gathering (3.000 people) and we organizers made a mistake: we calculated with this number (min. 2.000 visitors) The budget was set up, and we never imagined that there might be less people interested.  Due to this mistake we are now facing an almost 10 thousand Euro debt.

We only sold a few hundred tickets, and the number of the S.U.N. members (Founder, Honorary and Life-time) is still under 1 thousand (965). 

And now...

The festival was fantastic, and it was so great to see those familiar faces again.
Our Love tribe: like-minded and good-hearted Sisters and Brothers. 
 
 

The future

We know now we really must change how the budget works: 
we should ONLY spend what we already have.  

Many good people is helping to create the future of the SUN.
We believe in self-organization, and in the healing power of Nature.

Our smaller events are workshops, healing treatments, bicycle run, bio and handicrafts markets.

We know it takes time to evolve and that losses in the early years are common.

It is hard to do something new, but we are committed to creating a better festival. All excess funds made from this program will go straight into next years event and the S.U.N. community will be able to decide what it is spent on. We will get better and more focused from now on! 

We truly want to establish a spiritual home for the psychedelic family in the beautiful Nature and a create or own sustainable environment to enjoy!!

 

Summer Gathering

The atmosphere at S.U.N. is unmatched and we believe it is because we believe in and we love what we do, and we are open to learn and evolve. We will continue to make it better every time.

People said...

Please have a look at some of the feedback below from this years event and try to imagine how we can step this up another level. 

---

"What an absolutely stunning, fun and delightful gathering you all put together! Thank you thank you thank you with all my heart for every piece of creativity, magic and hard work that went into S.U.N Gathering 2016. I met incredible people (many of whom I hope to stay in touch with and see again soon), I danced for many days and nights, and I fell in love with my man all over again every day – it was heaven" - Lorna Buchanan-Jardine

---

"Thank you all you lovely people for making this first experience an amazing one for me, all the good vibes from the tent to the kitchen to the transport and to the dancefloor. Can’t wait to be back soon." - Eeden Huang ShengLian

---

"I felt the best feeling, the union of our souls feeling the music rumbling beneath our feet , pure air, connected to our mother nature, wild, conscious and happiness … Solar united natives… THANK U so much. See you next year. Peace, light and love for all…" - Misha Hernandez Quintero

---

"Dear Organizers, in my opinion you are on the right way.  If you could follow this lane and you could continue what you have started in the last year I think SUN will shine again in the middle of the sky." - Peter Kalocsai

---

"It's all about the vibe... And it's all there! Can't wait for more fun in the S.U.N." - Suduaya

---

"Thank You for all vibes, feelings and spirits. It was the best time in my life." - Lucky JLF

---

"It was a honor to play there. Wonderful, friendly people everywhere." - Olaf Minoru Gmo Gretzmacher

---

"One of my best festival experiences! I wished it would happen again RIGHT NOW and I would hop into our bus and come again!! :)" - SubConsciousMind

---

"It was just beautiful, definitely one of my best festival experiences yet!!!" - Basil Monn

---

"It was such a pleasure getting to know every single one of you. Sending a lot of love from Timisoara, hope we will meet again soon." - Teatrul Labirint Asylum

---

"I really loved this S.U.N.time with soooo many nice people and good vibes. I felt like 15 years ago: a part of a big lovely family. I hope we can celebrate together again next year..."- Cirmi Sh Blacklight

---

"It was a great surprise, the best of the festivals I've ever been at! Thanks S.U.N. for the lush of nature, the great variety of music, the scents, the smiles, the little experiences and friendly resonances from all the people there (also the dogs and cats :) ) The true spirit I've met so long before was discovered again, hope to see you next time & forever..." - Sümegi Pemzli

---

"Thanks so so so much for a wonderful time, filled with amazing vibes, big boogies and great people - it truly reminded me (having come from Australia) that we truly are a global community and we are all friends!!!!" - Miranda Hornung

---

"Another amazing, beautiful experience in the lovely Hungarian countryside." - Maia Snow

---

"I had a really back to the roots feeling." - Protonica

---

"It was a perfect back to the roots experience with lovely people all around…" - Petar

---

"One of the greatest festivals, with the best spirit, I've ever seen." - Mica Sphere

---

"It was a magical experience, with many many beautiful people! This festival is changed many things in my life, now i know what's important, and what's not." - Áron Kastaly

---

"Thank you SUN people for the love you shared. It was magical being a part of the tribe..." - Alek Tritt

---

"It was magic" - Laura Gaillart

---

Support us to continue the magic.

story:
Short Summary

GiftCaddies brings a zero-risk, low-cost proposition to merchants in a wide variety of industries:

• Restaurants
• Retail stores
• Flowers
• Spas
• Hotels
• Vacations
• Cruises
• Getaways
• Concerts
• Special Events

Following a distinctive branding and go-to-market launch, these targets will be the focus of the GiftCaddies marketing and business development programs. In addition to traditional marketing channels, GiftCaddies will greatly benefit from viral, person-to-person introductions on social media, and essentially "word-of-mouth" referrals.

Distribution

Two thirds of smartphone owners have used their device for shopping activities. Some people use their smartphone in simple ways to help them shop, such as taking a picture of a product, or contacting friends and family about a product. Shoppers have also used their smartphones in fairly sophisticated ways, such as searching for coupons, checking a store’s inventory, or looking up pricing comparisons. These activities all indicate that smartphones have become an integral part of the shopping experience, and that consumers are ready and able to use them in advanced ways.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $10,000 in our first campaign.

  • We will purchase digital content to help us spread the word on Social Media.
  • We will use funds to purchase media spends in future markets.
  • We will use all funds towards digital media and digital video content. 

The Impact

We are growing but with your help we can:

  • get in more markets at a faster rate.
  • attract more businesses to be on the platform.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share this video with your friends and family.
  • If you know any business that should be on GiftCaddies, let us know and receive a great referral reward. Also if you know any investors that would love GiftCaddies, please share. Thank you!
story_txt:
Short Summary
GiftCaddies brings a zero-risk, low-cost proposition to merchants in a wide variety of industries:• Restaurants• Retail stores• Flowers• Spas• Hotels• Vacations• Cruises• Getaways• Concerts• Special EventsFollowing a distinctive branding and go-to-market launch, these targets will be the focus of the GiftCaddies marketing and business development programs. In addition to traditional marketing channels, GiftCaddies will greatly benefit from viral, person-to-person introductions on social media, and essentially "word-of-mouth" referrals.
Distribution
Two thirds of smartphone owners have used their device for shopping activities. Some people use their smartphone in simple ways to help them shop, such as taking a picture of a product, or contacting friends and family about a product. Shoppers have also used their smartphones in fairly sophisticated ways, such as searching for coupons, checking a store’s inventory, or looking up pricing comparisons. These activities all indicate that smartphones have become an integral part of the shopping experience, and that consumers are ready and able to use them in advanced ways.

What We Need & What You Get
We are raising $10,000 in our first campaign.

We will purchase digital content to help us spread the word on Social Media.
We will use funds to purchase media spends in future markets.
We will use all funds towards digital media and digital video content. 


The Impact
We are growing but with your help we can:

get in more markets at a faster rate.
attract more businesses to be on the platform.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share this video with your friends and family.
If you know any business that should be on GiftCaddies, let us know and receive a great referral reward. Also if you know any investors that would love GiftCaddies, please share. Thank you!

story:
You just left home on a longer than usual drive.

Your car begins to stutter on an isolated stretch.

You have a flat tire and no cell phone signal.

There are times in everyone's lives when 
we find that help just isn't available
if our car breaks down

 

Your Complete Customized Carmine Organizer

 

Your Power-packed Core Carmine includes:

  1. The Carmine Organizer
  2. Tire Pressure Gauge
  3. Vehicle Vitals Customized to Year, Make & Model
  4. Brookstone Safety Flashlight and Tool
  5. Exclusive Carmine Membership that will unlock your access to:
    1. Exclusive discounts and exciting new technologies for your total vehicle experience
    2. How to videos by industry experts
    3. Forums for discussion, etc.

Pre-book your Carmine for
as little as $56

Carmine community members will also have first access to new technologies for the auto enthusiast and special guest instruction videos on a variety of how to’s for vehicle basics.
 
Our ace guest instructors include:
 

Pam Oakes

Pam Oakes was born in the automotive mecca of the world -- Detroit, Michigan and spent her teen years on Florida's southwest coast. Pam is a fourth generation auto technician: Her great-grandfather Leonard Smith, grandfather Ralph Smith and father Jerry Oakes were all automotive technicians. As a matter of fact, Pam's first auto lesson was from her great-grandfather, Leonard. He showed her how to set the choke on his 1969 Plymouth -- a vehicle she has restored and has sitting in her garage, today.

Pam started Pam's Motor City Automotive and Tires in 1995 and retired in 2015. Pam is a major advocate for car care and education to women and men everywhere.

 

Eric The Car Guy.

Eric has over 800,000 followers on YouTube.
 
 
 

 

Most men don’t blink twice before changing a flat tire, replacing a headlight, replacing wiper blades or simply checking basic fluids and preventative maintenance.

 
Most women shy away from any hands-on or DIY approach.
 
The challenges are many​
 
  • the need for proper car maintenance
  • road side breakdown
  • inflated auto repairs bills...

When you lack knowledge about your car, it adds to your woes.

 

 
 
 

Carmine is your own customized organizer with all of your vehicle vitals in one place along with some basic safety tools.

Carmine gives you the power of knowledge and preparedness for your personal needs.

Carmine is manufactured by Alignment Simple Solutions, the parent company of QuickTrick.

 
There is nothing wrong with not wanting to "Do it Yourself". If you are like me, the problem comes when I have to trust someone else to "advise" me on what my car needs or doesn't need.Knowledge is key and along with that comes the desire to be prepared for the most common, but inevitable, situations that can happen.
Tess Winningham,
Founder of Carmine
CEO, Alignment Simple Solutions
Makers of the QuickTrick Wheel Alignment Systems
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Our crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo is aimed at not only raising the funds to make the Carmine dream a reality. We aim to reach every woman driver and make her feel empowered, safe and confident!
 
We value the time you have taken reading it and will keep you informed about all updates happening on our Carmine Crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo.
 
We invite your feedback and eagerly await your response and suggestions! With your support, we can help change the way women understand their cars and eliminate the frustrations that accompany car maintenance!
 
If you are unable to contribute monetarily, you can still help us:
Spread the word around by sharing our campaign on your social networking accounts.
 
 

 

 

Carmine is not a text book on how to be your own personal mechanic. Carmine is meant to give you the power of knowledge and preparedness for your personal needs. It is like having a personal mechanic in your glove box.

We aren’t looking to make you a Master Mechanic!

Let's eliminate the frustration, fear, shame, and anxiety that can go hand in hand with car care.

 

 

There is NO One Carmine for Every Car!

Each and Every Carmine is personalized according to the year, make and model of your unique vehicle.

The information below serves as a basic outline of the essential things you must know to save money, to stay safe and to take care of your investment:

  1. Recommended tire pressure
  2. Recommended fluids & where they go Illustrated for your specific engine
    - Oil
    - Coolant
    - Transmission
    - Fluid
    - Brake Fluid v. Wiper Fluid
     

  3. Manufacturer’s recommended Wheel Alignment Specifications

  4. Slot for your Registration

  5. Slot for your Insurance Card

You will also receive an illustrated picture of your engine with your Carmine. The illustration will clearly indicate the location openings for your vital fluids, which ensures you are able to check them and know what goes in them.

All in One Emergency Tool Kit

Also included with your Carmine, is the Auto Safety Tool Kit, which includes 12 tools to help you in any vehicle emergency.

This tool kit includes the following:

  • Emergency beacon and flashlight with 2000X zoom for a focused beam
  • Seat belt cutter
  • Windshield hammer
  • Flat screwdriver and Phillips head screwdriver
  • Large/small screwdrivers
  • Bottle and can openers
  • Scissors
  • Knife

Keep one in your glove compartment next to your Carmine, and you’ll always be ready for the unexpected while mitigating emergencies with all of your personalized car vitals.

It is frustrating to not know the basic needs for our vehicles or WHERE to find them. Carmine helps you be an informed, savvy woman driver who knows her car inside out. Safeguard yourself against the unscrupulous auto mechanic with Carmine by your side. You know your car best!

You can know the basics of routine car maintenance and what you have to do to make sure your cars last.

It’s reassuring to know that my car is as prepared as I am to hit the road, whether we’re off to work, heading on a vacation or just taking a leisurely cruise on the weekend!

 

Every year I take our alignment systems on a comparison test to ensure our accuracy against the largest alignment franchises in the country. I routinely get treated like I have no understanding of what my cars need and I frequently get asked to pay for repairs or fluids that I don't need.

We have seen the horror stories on 20/20 and elsewhere that reveal the unethical practice of price gouging, which is especially common when the customers are women.

When you are on the road alone, be in charge of your car.
Carmine ensures you are safe and prepared.

Don't get me wrong though. The majority of shops are filled with good people. I have many friends in the industry who are providing a service above and beyond what is normally expected.

It is frustrating to not know the basic needs for our vehicles or WHERE to find them. I prefer to have an understanding of things I care about, and believe me, I love my cars and want them to last.

Our factory in Alabama

 

Carmine is the latest offering from Alignment Simple Solutions, the reliable and trusted entrepreneurial venture based in Alabama, United States and makers of the QuickTrick brand of wheel alignment solutions.

 

 

We have been greatly appreciated by our customers

 

We are a Certified Member of

 

Our Products are also Available at these Retailers

 

We Support Martin Truex Jr. Foundation

5% of all our profits go to Martin Truex Jr. Foundation, which is enriching the lives of those afflicted with Childhood and Ovarian Cancers and is striving to better the lives of women and children fighting the fight, every single day.

 

 

Tess Winningham, CEO & Co Founder receiving the 2014
Global Media Award for the QuickTrick Fleet System.

 

 

Stretch Goals

  1. We want to be the most reliable and trusted site for vehicle owners to obtain basic and critical automotive knowledge. We want to do this by giving our customers exclusive access to future automotive gadgets, tips, and how-to videos while also giving them the opportunity to customize their very own emergency kits based on their unique environment and needs. Such kits could include items like a hot meal maker, cool packs, emergency first aid, a no-connect phone charger and much more.

  2. We also want to build an app that will send alerts about routine maintenance and recalls and other general tips for your vehicle.
     
  3. The most important goal, however, is to continue making a difference for our customers, the charities we love and the great people who work with us. We treat the people who work with us and our customers like family!
     

Risks and Challenges

Our greatest challenge will be in gathering all of the required automotive data as we grow. We have lined up a couple of resources for reliable manufacturer’s information, but we will always need to do a second (and sometimes third) check to verify that all of the information stays correct and up-to-date.

We do expect some speed bumps as we seek to convey the value of Carmine to everyone with a vehicle, particularly women. Our goal is to provide the necessary knowledge needed for vehicle owners to make informed decisions that will preserve the health of their vehicles.

Regardless of the challenges, I am confident we will bring to life a great product to fill a worldwide need.

We started the QuickTrick portable tools line in our garage and now service 3 of the top 5 fleet vehicle owners in the US and have customers all the way from hot rodders and racers, to custom car builders, fleets, the military and school bus departments. QuickTrick family can now be found in over 105 Countries.

We want to apply that same success to Carmine with your help!

Thank you so much!!

Tess Winningham
Founder of Carmine
CEO, Alignment Simple Solutions
Makers of the QuickTrick Wheel Alignment Systems

story:
THE FACTS

On July 26, 2016 The Washington Post reported that the US government SUSPENDED over $200 million in aid to the Syrian people due to reports of fraud.

As the war in Syria continues to rage, the only lifelines for many civilians are the international NGOs supporting them. But in areas overwhelmed with violence and chaos, it is almost impossible to track if the aid reaches those most in need.


HOW IS AMALIAH DIFFERENT?

Amaliah.org is the only US nonprofit organization authorized to transport humanitarian aid through the Israeli border and into the Safe Zone, a designated territory in Southern Syria.

Amaliah processes all funds, purchases supplies requested by the Syrian local Council from inside the Safe Zone, and then transfers the aid directly to Syrians, without the use of third parties.This guarantees that donations don’t fall into the wrong hands.

Rebuilding infrastructure in the Safe Zone, where one million Syrians once resided, will allow for refugees to return their country. Currently, only 200,000 civilians remain.

Ultimately, Amaliah wants to support the movement to create a stabilized environment that will catalyze the rebuilding of Syrian civil society.

BECOME A CORPORATE SPONSOR-OR-DONATE GOODS

If you are interested in corporate sponsorship or donating any items listed above in addition to pharmaceuticals, medical equipment, etc., please email us at info(at)amaliah.org, or send us a message HERE.

JOIN OUR TEAM!

Amaliah is seeking interns and volunteers to work with us in NYC or Israel. Spread the word!

SOCIAL MEDIA SUPPORT

Please consider sharing our campaign on Social Media  – and encourage your network to further our meaningful mission.

 

Legal: Please note our fiscal sponsor is a 501(c)(3) organization, Ameinu Our People Inc.

story:
REVIVING CRAFT & CULTURE

When honest effort meets great artistry — magic happens.

Our aim: To bring this magic into your home.

If you're someone who's an adventurer at heart, and a traveler of new lands, you’d understand the thrill of bringing back something from your voyage which serves as a remnant of your experience. These pieces are significant because of what they represent; a journey. 

With Paimona’s handcrafted products, you don’t just take a piece of furniture with you; you take an element of Pakistan and become a part of the lives of our Artisans, who work tirelessly to create these pieces with their very own hands. Our products tell a unique story of how our culture, craft and Artisans came together and conjoined with modernity to provide you with something ethereal and timeless. With our pieces in your home, you can build your memories around our stories.

So, come join us in a journey that we’re just beginning, a journey of the revival of decades old heritage and help save the craft of our country.

OUR STORY

We bring together culture and craft to form a union which provides you with luxurious functionality, and highlights the importance of tradition. Our pieces are meant to excite, meant to make you question the thought process behind their making and meant to provide elegancy to your living space. Combinations of essential elements from our culture, such as food (The Deigh), music (The Dhol) and artistry (The Truck Art) with the exquisite wood engraving, carving and embroidery indigenous to Pakistan are our signature style.

THE MEANING

A word derived from the Dari language, the meaning of Paimona evolves to symbolize the transition of our deep rooted heritage into modernity.It signifies the ever-green nature of tradition and its ability to retain its vitality over hundreds of years. Paimona’s focus is on creating locally produced, ethereal pieces that can stand the test of the times and still be magical and meaningful. 

And therein began the story of Paimona.

THE IMPACT

The impact of this campaign, if we meet our goal, is two-fold. Firstly, it will provide the monetary base we need to make sure that this unique art of combining culture and craft, craft that is centuries old and has been carried down from before even the Mughal Era, does not die out. Secondly, it will help us spread knowledge of the work these Artisans do in the world.

With regard to ensuring that this art does not die out, Paimona aims to create a sustainable lifestyle for its Artisans. We want to provide them with a competitive income, and employment benefits to not only keep their work alive, but to simultaneously ensure that the Artisans can provide their families with a better future. Investing in a proper workplace means that we can train and educate even more Artisans.

Through the Artisans, we want to reach out, and make sure their children get the education they deserve too.

The process that our Artisans go through when making each piece, liberates them from the psychological boundaries which stop them from moving forward. Knowing that their pieces furnish the spaces of people, who genuinely care about their stories, really makes a difference to them. We plan on using these funds to create awareness, and get through to people like you who appreciate the exotic art we aim to revive.

We've just started out, and we're going to need your help getting Paimona's message across. That requires us to market our firm at a larger scale. We ask you to be part of the positive change Paimona envisions in the life of its artisans. Tradition is something we hold close to our hearts, and we can feel it slipping away. We hope that through this campaign will aid us in saving our heritage. We celebrate what our Artisans create, and we want you to celebrate their work with us.

 

BECOME A PART OF THE CHANGE!

 

Fund us so that we can reach our goal to create timeless pieces which bear testament to this country’s beauty that is hardly represented on the international forum. Fund us so that we can give the impoverished, under paid artisans a life of dignity by taking their craft global and giving them the respect and life they deserve for their hard work. Fund us so that we are able to give education to the children of these artisans which would break the vicious cycle of poverty continuing for generations and help them find their well deserved meaningful place in the world.

One of the most important ways you can support our project is by helping us to get the word out. Tell your friends and family. Tell your co-workers. Please share this video with people you know and encourage them to support us too. We are relying on your word of mouth to help get this project come to life.

We can make a big difference in Pakistan and the world. But only if we all do it together!

OUR PERKS

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

THE TIMELINE

 

WANT TO SPEAK TO US?

We're always eager to speak to anyone who's interested in the work we do. You can always drop us an email at hi@paimona.co, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can. Cheers!

Fund us so that we can give the impoverished, under paid artisans a life of dignity by taking their craft global and giving them the respect and life they deserve for their hard work. Fund us so that we are able to give education to the children of these artisans which would break the vicious cycle of poverty continuing for generations and help them find their well deserved meaningful place in the world.

One of the most important ways you can support our project is by helping us to get the word out. Tell your friends and family. Tell your co-workers. Please share this video with people you know and encourage them to support us too. We are relying on your word of mouth to help get this project come to life.
We can make a big difference in Pakistan and the world. But only if we all do it together!
OUR PERKS

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 
THE TIMELINE

 
WANT TO SPEAK TO US?
We're always eager to speak to anyone who's interested in the work we do. You can always drop us an email at hi@paimona.co, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can. Cheers!

story:
SKYFARMS:  

The App To Grow, Buy and Sell Fresh, Local Food

"When we couldn't afford food, we grew it.  Now we are creating the app to grow, buy and sell fresh, local food."

WHO WE ARE:

The SkyFarms app lets users search for local farms to buy food, sell food from farm-to-table, or start a farm in empty spaces to grow food and make money.  The sustainable online platform provides the access, support, and incentive to grow, buy and sell, fresh, local food.

WHAT WE ARE:  

SkyFarms app is an online farming and food facilitation platform.  Connecting consumers to local food purchase, offering farmers a space to sell more of their harvest online, and creating a community of spaces and support where everyday people who want to get involved in farming can grow food and make money in any empty space.

HOW WE WORK:  

SkyFarms is an open source, DIY, peer-to-peer platform providing the access to:

1.  Search for local farms and food 

2.  Sell food from farm-to-table 

3.  Start a farm in an empty space 

SkyFarm's platform provides sustainable incentive to create and access more local food production and educate self-reliance as a step toward a more abundant and stable future.  

WHO WE SERVE:

We capture a share of the millennial, urbanite and neo markets by providing:

1. Opportunity to become a micro-entrepreneurial start-up.

2. Revenue to grow food.

3. Automated access to quality controlled purchases, profiles, and accounts.  

3. The space and technology to create new local farms and customers.  

4. Participation in an Eco-conscious, environmental lifestyle.  

5. Access an online farmer's market and self-reliant food production.

6. Community, information and education.

7. Connection to food democracy and autonomy to cultivate fresh, healthy, local food.

WHY WE DO IT:

NASA innovations have shifted when, where and how we approach agriculture by developing a sustainable process of growing nutrient rich food in a soilless mist medium, requiring less space, energy, water and time, making it possible to grow quality food by anyone, anywhere, at anytime.  It is called Aeroponics.  (Photos of Shareconomy and Aeroponics)

Driven by urbanization, sustainability, economic volatility, and technology, we have entered an emergent financial market that provides access to goods and services.  It is disrupting, and in some cases, replacing ownership.  This allows people to begin to start their own business through a peer-peer transaction. It is called the shareconomy. 

The problem is 70% of the population will eventually live in urban cities.  Many of these cities lack a local farming infrastructure.  Yet, many of these city's commercial and residential space sits empty and unused, and can be transformed into farms.  Many consumer want to eat local but can't make it to the farmer's market.  Many farmers want to sell to new customers but don't have the marketing power to reach more people.  The solution is SkyFarms.

The challenge facing potential business farmers today who want to grow their own food locally isn't desire or capability, it's access to space.   Consumers who want to buy local produce also lack access and convenience to local farms outside of the weekend farmer's market. 

WHEN WE STARTED:   

We didn't have enough money to buy food, so we grew it.  Even though I was born in a first world country, I grew up sometimes living in third world conditions.  I'll never forget the morning I was so hungry for breakfast I ate cake mix donated from the leftovers of a food bank.  It was the last thing in our empty cupboard.  At the time, I felt my future was as empty too.

Having grown up around a lot of farmers, I decided if we couldn't buy the food then we would have to grow our own.  Rather than starve by looking at our pretty lawn, I ripped up the grass, which was inedible and wasted resources, and planted seeds that would harvest not only delicious things I could eat, but questions that I knew had to be answered in my lifetime. How do we sustain ourselves, each other and this planet?  

The answer was found in the incentive to become self-reliant and the access to support, space and technology.  All which currently exist and SkyFarms is designed to deliver.

WHAT WE NEED:  

We are raising enough seeds to plant our first demonstrable pilot.  Our first phase roll-out requires a development retainer, start-up cost of building the network and installing the first SkyFarm, and marketing and operating capital for six months.

CONTRIBUTION PERKS

$25 - Contribute seeds for the first SkyFarm and receive a plantable SkyFarms certificate 

$50 -  $15 plantable certificate toward any future SkyFarms purchase

$100 - Personal thank you video and $15 plantable certificate toward future SkyFarm purchase

$200 - 6 Pack of Fresh Pressed Juices

$400 - Buy a Plot in the first SkyFarm with you or your company name

$800 - Sponsor and Name a SkyFarm with you or your company name

$1,500 - Become a SkyFarms advisor board member, share ideas and vote on decisions

$2k - Receive NASA designed Tower Garden kit to grow in your own home

WHERE TO GET INVOLVED

Even if you cannot contribute financially, you can share your time and energy to support access to local farming.  Here are some ways you can immediately get involved. 

1.  Enter our "A Space To Grow" contest on Instagram by posting a photo of your space with #SkyFarmsapp

2.  Join our social media "AD-venture" on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Or Pintrist

3. Share our "Seed To Sky" Goals

4. Talk to friends, family and community, about SkyFarms preferably over a local grown meal! 

5.  Share our PRESS RELEASE: The Hunger Games:

http://us13.campaign-archive1.com/?u=7989a2cb17...

WHY GET INVOLVED?

SkyFarms sustainable approach aims to diversify farming methods to ensure feeding the growing population, reduce pollution, consume less oil/energy, conserve water, fix failing economic/labor practices, instill healthier food quality and control, and finally alleviate hunger.  SkyFarms is designed to foster sustainable values, promote local economic growth, and most of all generate self-reliant individuals and communities.    

In the 30 days that it will take to complete this SkyFarm crowdfunding campaign, almost 1,000,000 people will not have access to enough food and will die of hunger.  It happens every three seconds. This is a path that is unsustainable, threatens our security and stability at home and abroad.  

The U.N. declared in 2001 that we had the technology and resources to feed everyone.  It's not that it's not possible to feed everyone, it's just that it's not profitable.  Until now.  By combining the economic mobility of the shareconomy with accessibility of NASA designed aeroponics, SkyFarms is creating the incentive to grow food and earn an income.  

Future Philanthropic Opportunities

-refugees

-earthquake/hurricane/disaster areas

-Africa/Haiti/impoverished urban areas 

-war torn, climate change effected areas 

-churches, schools

-underprivileged urban outreach

-prisons 

-hospitals/veteran/nursing homes

WE THANK YOU

On behalf of myself and all those who will benefit from this shift to sustainable farm-space sharing, thank you for your generous seed contribution to our first SkyFarm.  We appreciate every amount of support and awareness in our mission to make it accessible for anyone, anywhere at any time to grow, buy and sell fresh, local food, while also being prosperous for people and the planet, and putting more food on the table!

story:
You're invited to participate in an exciting venture to increase the circulation of one of the Inside-the-Washington, D.C.-Beltway's most influential weekly newspapers by tenfold or more! The mighty Falls Church News-Press has been fighting to good fight on behalf of the suburban D.C. community it serves and also on behalf of important progressive causes for over 25 years.

The Falls Church News-Press has been an indispensable leader in not only shaping opinion in the nation's capital by being welcomed into the households of thousands of movers and shakers working in the most powerful city in the world, but also by swaying the popular vote in Virginia statewide elections with all but one candidate (all Democrats) it has endorsed in statewide races since 2000 winning, often by margins of victory provided in its unique distribution area, and turning the state from bright red to purple and soon deep blue. It is the recipient of many awards and accolades, being named “Business of the Year' multiple times by the Falls Church City Council and its owner-editor Nicholas Benton being named “Business Person of the Year.” twice winning the Falls Church Chamber of Commerce's “Pillar of the Community” award and the statewide Equality Virginia's esteemed “OUTstanding Virginian” award.

BUT NOW COMES AN EXTRAORDINARY NEW TECHNOLOGY THAT CAN PUT THE FALLS CHURCH NEWS-PRESS IN AN ADDITIONAL 100,000 EMAIL ADDRESSES IN THE REGION THROUGH DIRECT, PRE-VETTED EMAILS OF PDF FILES OF THE ACTUAL PAPER, EVERY PAGE, EVERY STORY, EVERY ADVERTISEMENT JUST AS THEY APPEAR IN THE PRINTED EDITION!!!

This will enhance the influence of the newspaper by many orders of magnitude in the wider Northern Virginia region of the Washington, D.C. Metro area where it has been a respected institution since 1991. Now, you are invited to participate as a pioneer in the launching of this wonderful new venture by your financial participation in the Falls Church News-Press expansion campaign.  Please step up and you will be rewarded not only by knowing how you are contributing to the growth of a free and open press directly impacting our nation's capital, but by receiving tokens of appreciation, recognition in the pages of the Falls Church News-Press, and even astonishingly, specially-discounted advertising space in the newspaper.

Here's what we will give you to thank you for your financial participation in our expansion campaign (Advertising offers not good with any other offers or existing contracts. specs available at fcnp.com):

$25 --       Your name in the Falls Church New Press (FCNP); 

$250 --      Your name in the FCNP, plus, the FCNP Book with the front pages of every News Press published in the FCNP's first five years: 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994 and 1995

$1,000 --- Your name in the FCNP, plus, the FCNP Book, plus, 3 half-page ads (open rate value $2,802) or equivalents

$2,500 --  Your name in the FCNP, plus, the FCNP Book, plus 3 full page ads (open rate value   $4,785) or equivalents

$10,000 - Your name in the FCNP, plus, the FCNP Book, plus 13 full page ads (open rate value $20,735) or equivalents

$25,000 -  Your name in the FCNP, plus, the FCNP Book, plus 26 full page ads (open rate value $41,470) or equivalents

$50,000 - Your name in the FCNP, plus, the FCNP Book, plus weekly full page ads for one year. (open rate value $82,940)

 THANK YOU!!!

story:
Blush & Whimsy was founded in early 2016 to create products that bring fairy tales to life. As a startup out of Albuquerque, New Mexico, we are expanding our luxury cosmetics fabrication and seeking to provide skilled jobs. Our initial product line uses our exclusive LipGlass technology to capture real flowers, and the formula changes color based on your body's unique pH and temperature of your skin. 

We need your help! The interest in our products has been tremendous, and we are rapidly growing our inventory to meet the demand. 

To learn more about Blush & Whimsy continue reading below.

Micaela Brown

Three years ago, I took the leap into the startup space challenging myself to find ways to create extraordinary experiences from ordinary reality. I believe that magic shouldn't only be for the movies, and I've found a way to bring elements of magic into everyday life. My passion for creating spectacular experiences evolved from events to items that we use every day. For the past year, I have meticulously worked on formulations and product design to bring you the first of (what I hope to be) many new product lines!

And now, we need your help—to make  things that were once ordinary into the most extraordinary items you've ever seen!  We appreciate your support and everything you can do to help spread the word and get people as excited and passionate about Blush & Whimsy as we are. 

Thank you so much,
The Blush & Whimsy team 

P.S. Mr. Paws Barkley, the chihuahua, likes to come to work with Micaela

 

First Product Line

Blush & Whimsy cosmetics are made with the finest ingredients. In this first product line, each lipstick has the same reaction to your skin, creating the same color regardless of flower color. 

What it Looks Like

We teamed up with Nyika Allen of NyikaTV to show you what it looks like on! 

Inventory is critical at the startup level, and 100% of the funds raised from this campaign will go towards funding our first production run and creating product to meet demand. Any additional funds (over our goal) will be used to increase staffing for manufacturing, packaging, and setting up distribution.

Inventory 100%

Staffing 

Packaging

Distribution

With your support, we can make Blush & Whimsy a huge success, build inventory, create much needed jobs, and you are part of our story!

 

 

Make a contribution to Blush & Whimsy and earn great perk in the process!

Help us spread the word:

  1. Share #Blush&Whimsy on social media! Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the campaign page

  2. Talk about the project with your friends!

We’re incredibly excited to launch these products, and have a lot planned. But, ultimately Blush & Whimsy founders want to say thank you. We greatly appreciate your support!

 

Q: Are your products FDA certified?

A: Yes! We have all certifications required to launch a cosmetics company in the USA

Q: Is that a real flower inside of the lipstick?

A: Yes! Here's a photo of the flower and different colors that are coming to our collection!

Q: What are the ingredients of the lipsticks?

A: (Ingredients) Ceresin, Hydrogenated Poluisobutene, Polyethlene, Squalane, Tridecyl, Trimellitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Isopropyl Palmitate, PEG - 30 Phytosterols, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance, (Color) D&C RED NO. 6 DISODIUM SALT/CI 15850, D&C RED NO. 27 ALUMINUM LAKE/CI45410:2, FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE/CI 42090:2, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE/CI15850:1, FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE/CI 42090:2, HYDRATED CHROME OXIDE GREEN/CI77289, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE/CI15850:1, FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE/CI 42090:2

Q: What makes the lipstick change color?

A: RED NO. 27 is the active ingredient that creates the magical color change

Q: Do you test on animals?

A: Absolutely not! Humans only

Q: What color will it look like on me?

A: Everyone's pH is unique; the color will be a shade that fits your skin tone

Q: When will I get my perks?

A: Expect delivery 6-8 weeks after the campaign has concluded.

Q: Will any perks go out before the campaign is completed?

A: Unfortunately, no.

Q: How do I tell you what t-shirt size I need?

A: When the campaign comes to an end, we will send you an email, that you can reply to, inquiring about the style and size you want.

Q: What if I want more than one perk?

A: You can make multiple gifts on Indiegogo using a single account. Just make sure you use the same email address and login, so we’ll know that all of your perks are meant to go to the same person.

Q: How much is shipping? What if I'm an international donor?

A: Shipping is included in the perk price, regardless of your location.

Q: What if I want one of the perks and it is sold out?

A: Some perks are only available in limited quantities because of their special nature. So get these perks while they’re hot and contribute now! If possible, we will increase the number of a few limited release perks and we’ll be adding a few more awesome perks throughout the campaign. Stay tuned!

Q: Do you test on animals?
A: Absolutely not! Humans only

Q: What color will it look like on me?
A: Everyone's pH is unique; the color will be a shade that fits your skin tone

Q: When will I get my perks?
A: Expect delivery 6-8 weeks after the campaign has concluded.
Q: Will any perks go out before the campaign is completed?
A: Unfortunately, no.
Q: How do I tell you what t-shirt size I need?
A: When the campaign comes to an end, we will send you an email, that you can reply to, inquiring about the style and size you want.
Q: What if I want more than one perk?
A: You can make multiple gifts on Indiegogo using a single account. Just make sure you use the same email address and login, so we’ll know that all of your perks are meant to go to the same person.
Q: How much is shipping? What if I'm an international donor?
A: Shipping is included in the perk price, regardless of your location.
Q: What if I want one of the perks and it is sold out?
A: Some perks are only available in limited quantities because of their special nature. So get these perks while they’re hot and contribute now! If possible, we will increase the number of a few limited release perks and we’ll be adding a few more awesome perks throughout the campaign. Stay tuned!

story:
My name is Hayley Guerrier. I moved to Eastleigh almost 2 years ago and in that time have become increasingly disappointed with the ales on offer. If I want to pop out for a delicious real craft beer, I have to travel to Southampton (which is a pain in the arse).

It turns out, I'm not the only person that feels this way, so I have decided to make it happen by opening a Micropub right smack bang in the middle of Eastleigh town.

Obviously, dreams such as this one come at a price and although I'm able to front a fair wad of start-up costs myself, I need your help just to give us a nudge and make up the shortfall.

This is a business for the community, as a loyal customer you will have a say in the beers that we sell. Our casks and kegs will be on a constant rotation and be meticulously selected from the best small craft breweries in the world and also supporting those local brews that we love to see at our annual beer festivals.

Not only will you benefit from having a new and exciting alternative to the tired old traditional pub, but we are offering some exclusive perks just for donating. These include; your name engraved onto your very own beer pump so you can be part of the furniture forever OR a VIP ticket to opening night (yes, drinks included!).

Once you've sent us your donation, don't forget to share, share, share! Get the word out that real ale is coming home!

story:
Pastel provides a newer perspective on coworking — a place designed for women.

Pastel recognizes that women who once relished the chance to grow their careers from the comfort of home are now finding that they’re losing a sense of balance between work and home life, so we’re going to redesign the former Level 447 nightclub at 447 Forest Avenue in Plymouth into a workspace for women entrepreneurs who seek connection and collaboration in a professional environment.

 

 

Come for the WiFi, stay for the people.

Pastel will be as much a vibrant community as it is a place to work. Entrepreneurs, designers, independent business owners, artists, programmers, writers, and more will be part of a like-minded community with shared and private workspaces, internet access, printing, refreshments, and other services and activities. 

 

Some will join for the convenience or as a place to hold meetings. Others, who want to make new connections outside their existing network, might come after hours for social events or workshops. Our full calendar of workshops and classes will make Pastel a community hub that provides women with positivity, tools and inspiration to live healthier and more fulfilled lives.

 

We aspire to make our member’s job something she never wants to quit.

Located near Main Street, Pastel’s loft-style space will be set up to feel like a “dream office,” delivering a sensory experience with lush upholstery, gorgeous lighting and chic accents. The atmosphere will be crafted to give working women as tranquil and transformative an experience as possible and foster productivity and innovation with a sense of control, success, purpose and balance.

 

 

Pastel founder, Renee Deming, knows first-hand that there is a need for independent business women to work and connect out of the house yet still close to home. In her pre-kid days, she was a graphic designer at boutique design shops and large advertising firms. After she said good-bye to the structure of a traditional workplace, and hello to the flexibility of entrepreneurship, she found her tribe by designing for women-owned businesses while mentoring former coworkers as they, too, took the leap into working on their own terms.

Renee is creating Pastel to provide a place for independent business women to find support, balance and connection. And because and she truly believes that investing in women is the smartest economic venture of today. It will advance our communities, our businesses and our future leaders.

Financial Needs  

To turn our concept of Pastel into a reality will require at least $65,000. We have received an SBA loan to get us off the ground. But we need your help to furnish and decorate to create a transformative workspace for our members.

  • Office Furniture & Decor is by far the greatest expense, since we need everything (desks, chairs, conference table, lighting, etc.) to make the space livable to our members.
  • Office Supplies and Equipment will make the space functional with WiFi routers, presentation screens, color printer, IP cameras and security features.

 

Friend of Pastel

If you just want to show your support, we want to show our gratitude! Grab everything from a pin to T-shirt to a ticket to the Grand Opening Party. Every friend will be invited to an early access day and have a chance to sign the supporters' wall and be a part of our history forever.

Become a Founding Member

Here’s your chance to get early access (and some perks). Through your one month (or more) commitment, you are helping us in many ways:

  • You are kickstarting our renovation progress
  • You are giving us an idea of what our monthly membership will be once we are open 
  • You are showing that you support the growth of women in business

Choose the member level that best fits your needs. All members who sign up via this Indiegogo campaign will receive early access to the Pastel space when we open in spring 2017. 

We have created a number of different membership levels. By signing up via this Indiegogo campaign you will receive early access to the space in spring 2017.

 

Advocate

For those who have been shouting from the rooftops for years that there was a gender imbalance in entrepreneurship, it is probably unbelievable that men haven’t heard the cry before this. The support of men is crucial to moving forward. Show that you champion women who want to control their own destiny by doing what they love on terms that work for them, their family, their relationships and their health.

Role Model

Share your story. Not because you’re bragging but because you’re an inspiration to other women. Knowing other women entrepreneurs plays an important role in directly enhancing aspirations of women to start their own businesses. As they say, seeing is believing.

Community Partner

There is no better way to get your brand out to the women in the SE Michigan business community than to be a Pastel community partner. Our target members’ ages range from 22 to 92, and cover a wide range of professions: women entrepreneurs, designers, independent business owners, artists, writers, and other professionals with nontraditional office needs. Our classes and workshops will range from women with high-stress jobs to women who choose not to work, local and national women’s organizations, bridal parties, corporations doing team-building exercises, and even fundraising organizations.

 

What EXACTLY am I signing up for when I purchase a MEMBERSHIP perk?

Technically, nothing! You aren't committing to a contract and you don't have to sign a lease. You are simply donating to our startup costs and, in return, receiving a gift of membership as a thank you. We will send you a link to get registered in our system, choose your membership start date and agree to our terms. At the end of your "perk," you can choose to remain a member (and we're sure you will!).

 

When will Pastel officially open?

We are currently planning to open in May 2017 however construction timing may add a delay. We will open no later than August.

 

Are men allowed in the space?

We get this question a lot. Although our focus in on empowering women, Pastel, LLC, does not discriminate by gender and will accept memberships and workshop registrations from both men and women. Men (and women) who are non-members are allowed in the space during normal business hours for meetings only. They must be in a designated meeting area or private office and they must be accompanied by a Pastel member. Men (and women) who are non-members are also allowed in the space for after-hours workshops and when it is being rented for private events.

 

Do you foresee any risks or challenges?

We have plans in place for construction, materials and funding. However, a lot is going to happen between now and May and construction delays may delay the delivery of your perk. If this happens, we will let you know right away.

 

How can I help without spending any money?

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean that you can't help.

Help us spread the word by:

  • Clicking on the share buttons on the upper right corner of this page.
  • Inviting us to share our vision with your social group or organization

We can't wait for you to be a part of Pastel.

story:
Wer sind wir?

Wir sind ein junges, engagiertes Projektteam der HTBLA Kaindorf an der Sulm (Österreich), welches aus

Michael Hirtenfellner

Manuel Hanschitz

Lukas Gspurning

Raphael Kalchgruber besteht.

Who are we?

We are a young, dedicated project team studying at HTBLA Kaindorf/Sulm (Austria), consisting of

Michael Hirtenfellner,

Manuel Hanschitz

Lukas Gspurning

Raphael Kalchgruber.


Was wollen wir?

Unser Ziel ist es, einen Transporter für Hilfslieferungen zu finanzieren, um Kindern in Osteuropa Schulbildung zu ermöglichen. Außerdem werden mit diesem Transporter desöfteren Lebensmittel und Spielzeuglieferungen an die Menschen in ärmeren Regionen Europas realisiert.Unser Zielgebiet liegt dabei vorallem auf Rumänien, der Slowakei und Ungarn. Der zuvor eingesetzte Transporter, welcher bereits seit über 20 Jahren Hilfslieferungen transportierte, segnete vor kurzem das Zeitliche. Eine Reparatur würde mehrere tausend Euro kosten, was nicht wirtschaftlich wäre. 

What do we want?

Our goal is to fund a transporter for aid deliveries, to help facilitate better education in

Eastern Europe. Furthermore, groceries and toys for the people in the poorer parts of Europe shall be delivered.

Our main target area are the countries of Romania, Slovakia and Hungary.

The previously used transporter, which did his job for 20 years, departed this life.

Repair costs would be several thousand euros, which is not sustainable.



Für wen machen wir das?

Diese Spendenaktion ist für uns ein Schulprojekt, welches dem OSMTH zugute kommt. Der O.S.M.T.H. - AUSTRIA ist eine christlich-ökumonische Organisation, die sich humanitäre und karitative Aufgaben gestellt hat, und seit dem Jahre 1993 als solche im österreichischen Vereinsregister gemeldet ist. Seit über 20 Jahren bringt der OSMTH bereits Hilfslieferungen nach Osteuropa.

Who are we doing this for?

This fundraiser is a school project, which helps the OSMTH, which is a Christian-Ocumenic organization dedicated to humanitarian and charitable causes. It's registered in the Austrian Register of Association since 1993 and has been shipping aid deliveries to Eastern Europe for 20 years.


Was geben Sie uns?

Eine Spende für einen guten Zweck, nämlich Kindern in Not ein bessere Leben zu ermöglichen. 

What are we asking you for?

A donation for a charitable cause, which is bringing a better life to children in need.


Wieviel geben Sie uns?

Einen Betrag Ihrer Wahl - jeder Cent zählt!

How much are we asking you for?

An amount of your choice. Every cent is appreciated.


Wieviel benötigen wir?

Wir haben uns ein Ziel von ca. 5.000€ gesetzt, da der anzuschaffende Transporter langstreckentauglich sein sollte, und dies mit weniger Budget nur sehr schwer erreicht werden kann.

How much do we need?

We are aiming for approximately 5,000€, because our transporter of choice should be suitable

for longer distances, and that's hardly possible with a small budget.



Was bekommen Sie von uns?

Für eine Spende von 100€ erhalten Sie eine Briefmarke aus einer limitierten Auflage von nur 500 Stück weltweit. Diese Briefmarke wurde vom OSMTH entworfen und bereits für wohltätige Zwecke verkauft. Aufgrund der limitierten Auflage, welche bereits fast ausverkauft ist, kann sich der Wert der Marke nur noch steigern.

What do you get from us?

For a donation of 100€, you get a stamp from a limited edition of only 500 pieces. That stamp was designed by OSMTH and is sold for charitable causes. Due to the limited amount, which almost entirely sold, their value can only increase over time.


Doch was, wenn wir unser Ziel nicht erreichen?

Dieses Szenario existiert nicht! Jeder Betrag, jeder Euro, jeder Cent - alles eine riesige Hilfe für die Kinder. Wenn der Betrag aus der Kampagne nicht ausreicht, um einen Transporter zu finanzieren, teilen wir das Geld an Schulen in Osteuropa auf, um den Kindern Computer, Hefte, Stifte und anderes Schulmaterial zu finanzieren.

But, what if we don't reach our goal?

That scenario doesn't exist. Every amount, every euro, every cent is a great help for the children.

If the donations are not sufficient for a transporter, they will be shared among the schools in Eastern Europe, to fund computers and school materials for the children.




Hier ist ein Beitrag zum O.S.M.T.H. und seinen Hilfslieferungen. 

Please take a look at this article about the OSMTH and its aid deliveries:

http://www.meinbezirk.at/guessing/chronik/850-kubikmeter-hilfsgueter-in-20-jahren-d1110828.html

story:
Health Initiatives Association (HIA) is a young organisation with clear vision, mission and objectives. HIA operates mostly in Buikwe District in Central Uganda. The overall goal of HIA is to contribute to the present efforts in the country that are aimed at quality life, self-worth and hope for bright future for HIV infected children, adolescents and other vulnerable and marginalised groups countrywide.


The heart and headquarters of HIA activities is John Paul II Children´s HIV/AIDS Clinic located in Buikwe Trading Centre. It is already well known for specialized and complex HIV care provided to HIV infected children and their families. The important fact is that this care is provided completely for free. Social program, community program, children´s prevention program, youth corner and income generating activities together build a holistic piece. HIV prevalence among children under age 5 is 0.4% in Central 2 region, where Buikwe belongs. HIV prevalence among young people 15-24 years in Central 2 region is 4.3 % (females 5.1% and males 3.1%). Because of this alarming statistics Health Initiatives Association has chosen Buikwe District as target operating area.

After 3 years of activities HIA team is challenged by several issues. First one is that the road just in front of the clinic is going to be widen in 2016 and part of the building, where the clinic operates, will be destroyed. Second is that in the same building is from September 2015 running a political campaign. Many local people consider this clinic as a part of the political party, what plays against the character of the organisation, which is clearly apolitical. Active participating in a political campaign can influence staff and clients of the organization as well.

The way out of this situation is to obtain own piece of land somewhere near to the current clinic and to construct suitable children´s clinic, community hall accompanied by compound arrangements as playground, nutrition garden, farming program. Currently the funds are covering the first part of clinic construction, which started in the first week of October 2015.


However the funds are not enough to cover also the administrative part of clinic. The complete budgeted amount for the construction in all the phases is 409 million UGX* (113 800 Euro, 124 100 USD), currently available funds 249.3 million UGX (69 300 Euro, 75 600 USD). So the missing amount for finalising the clinic construction is 107.7 million UGX (30 000 Euro, 32 700 USD). This is the target of our fundraising nowadays. 

* Exchange rate: 1 Euro= 3600 UGX, 1 USD= 3300 UGX, calculated throughout the different project phases

HIA team is ready to perform the best possible services if given the chance. To make this proposal reality there is a need for financial help of various partners. Therefore we humbly request you to join our common effort to “raise hope again”.
